title: BUS discretionary mode for IBAN
time_sequence: GN - ATLAS PHASE 5.3 - PROCESSING AFTER STAR 1

task_list.instruction_title: _Check that company code (in bold below) are in line with current  migration_

BUS discretionary mode for IBAN: We want to let IBAN messages out of ATLAS into BTPUB go through the bus. These messages are coming out of the queue \"AQU1\":
